channel.title: Apple on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Apple on PepsFeeder

item.title: Apple hit with $500 million iPhone lawsuit settlement
item.description: Apple has agreed to pay as much as $500 million to settle a class action lawsuit over its phone batteries — and you would possibly glean a (little) decrease of that.

item.title: After China described him as a poison .. Apple acquiesces and removes a special application maps Hong Kong
item.description: HONG KONG (Reuters) – Apple on Wednesday removed an application from its shop that protesters in Hong Kong used to track police moves through, claiming it violated rules because it was used to ambush police.
